m_szDocTitle: Hydrogen Fuel Cell Cars Return for Another Run  - The New York Times
m_szDocSumamry: The New York Times Automobiles |Hydrogen Fuel Cell Cars Return for Another Run Advertisement By LAWRENCE ULRICH APRIL 16, 2015 Inside Photo A refilling station for hydrogen fuel cell vehicles near the University of California, Irvine. Credit Stuart Palley for The New York Times Advertisement Continue reading the main story FOR decades, hydrogen has been the Dracula of automotive fuels: Just when you think a stake has been driven through its zero-emissions heart, the technology rises from the grave.
